text.ascii: bhIma uvAca
text.ur: bhīma uvāca

text.ascii: pUrvarUpam adRSTvA te na yAsyAmi kathaM cana
text.ur: pūrvarūpam adr̥ṣṭvā te na yāsyāmi kathaṁ cana

text.ascii: yadi te 'ham anugrAhyo darzayAtmAnam AtmanA
text.ur: yadi te ’ham anugrāhyo darśayātmānam ātmanā

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: evam uktas tu bhImena smitaM kRtvA plavaMgamaH
text.ur: evam uktas tu bhīmena smitaṁ kr̥tvā plavaṁgamaḥ

text.ascii: tad rUpaM darzayAm Asa yad vai sAgaralaGghane
text.ur: tad rūpaṁ darśayām āsa yad vai sāgaralaṅghane

text.ascii: bhrAtuH priyam abhIpsan vai cakAra sumahad vapuH
text.ur: bhrātuḥ priyam abhīpsan vai cakāra sumahad vapuḥ

text.ascii: dehas tasya tato 'tIva vardhaty AyAmavistaraiH
text.ur: dehas tasya tato ’tīva vardhaty āyāmavistaraiḥ

text.ascii: tad rUpaM kadalISaNDaM chAdayann amitadyutiH
text.ur: tad rūpaṁ kadalīṣaṇḍaṁ chādayann amitadyutiḥ

text.ascii: girez cocchrayam Agamya tasthau tatra sa vAnaraH
text.ur: gireś cocchrayam āgamya tasthau tatra sa vānaraḥ

text.ascii: samucchritamahAkAyo dvitIya iva parvataH
text.ur: samucchritamahākāyo dvitīya iva parvataḥ

text.ascii: tAmrekSaNas tIkSNadaMSTro bhRkuTIkRtalocanaH
text.ur: tāmrekṣaṇas tīkṣṇadaṁṣṭro bhr̥kuṭīkr̥talocanaḥ

text.ascii: dIrghalAGgUlam Avidhya dizo vyApya sthitaH kapiH
text.ur: dīrghalāṅgūlam āvidhya diśo vyāpya sthitaḥ kapiḥ

text.ascii: tad rUpaM mahad AlakSya bhrAtuH kauravanandanaH
text.ur: tad rūpaṁ mahad ālakṣya bhrātuḥ kauravanandanaḥ

text.ascii: visismiye tadA bhImo jahRSe ca punaH punaH
text.ud: विसिस्मिये तदा भीमो जहृषे च पुनः पुनः
text.ur: visismiye tadā bhīmo jahr̥ṣe ca punaḥ punaḥ

text.ascii: tam arkam iva tejobhiH sauvarNam iva parvatam
text.ur: tam arkam iva tejobhiḥ sauvarṇam iva parvatam

text.ascii: pradIptam iva cAkAzaM dRSTvA bhImo nyamIlayat
text.ur: pradīptam iva cākāśaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā bhīmo nyamīlayat

text.ascii: AbabhASe ca hanumAn bhImasenaM smayann iva
text.ur: ābabhāṣe ca hanumān bhīmasenaṁ smayann iva

text.ascii: etAvad iha zaktas tvaM rUpaM draSTuM mamAnagha
text.ur: etāvad iha śaktas tvaṁ rūpaṁ draṣṭuṁ mamānagha

text.ascii: vardhe 'haM cApy ato bhUyo yAvan me manasepsitam
text.ur: vardhe ’haṁ cāpy ato bhūyo yāvan me manasepsitam

text.ascii: bhIma zatruSu cAtyarthaM vardhate mUrtir ojasA
text.ur: bhīma śatruṣu cātyarthaṁ vardhate mūrtir ojasā

text.ascii: tad adbhutaM mahAraudraM vindhyamandarasaMnibham
text.ur: tad adbhutaṁ mahāraudraṁ vindhyamandarasaṁnibham

text.ascii: dRSTvA hanUmato varSma saMbhrAntaH pavanAtmajaH
text.ur: dr̥ṣṭvā hanūmato varṣma saṁbhrāntaḥ pavanātmajaḥ

text.ascii: pratyuvAca tato bhImaH saMprahRSTatanUruhaH
text.ur: pratyuvāca tato bhīmaḥ saṁprahr̥ṣṭatanūruhaḥ

text.ascii: kRtAJjalir adInAtmA hanUmantam avasthitam
text.ur: kr̥tāñjalir adīnātmā hanūmantam avasthitam

text.ascii: dRSTaM pramANaM vipulaM zarIrasyAsya te vibho
text.ud: दृष्टं प्रमाणं विपुलं शरीरस्यास्य ते विभो
text.ur: dr̥ṣṭaṁ pramāṇaṁ vipulaṁ śarīrasyāsya te vibho

text.ascii: saMharasva mahAvIrya svayam AtmAnam AtmanA
text.ur: saṁharasva mahāvīrya svayam ātmānam ātmanā

text.ascii: na hi zaknomi tvAM draSTuM divAkaram ivoditam
text.ud: न हि शक्नोमि त्वां द्रष्टुं दिवाकरमिवोदितम्
text.ur: na hi śaknomi tvāṁ draṣṭuṁ divākaram ivoditam

text.ascii: aprameyam anAdhRSyaM mainAkam iva parvatam
text.ur: aprameyam anādhr̥ṣyaṁ mainākam iva parvatam

text.ascii: vismayaz caiva me vIra sumahAn manaso 'dya vai
text.ur: vismayaś caiva me vīra sumahān manaso ’dya vai

text.ascii: yad rAmas tvayi pArzvasthe svayaM rAvaNam abhyagAt
text.ur: yad rāmas tvayi pārśvasthe svayaṁ rāvaṇam abhyagāt

text.ascii: tvam eva zaktas tAM laGkAM sayodhAM sahavAhanAm
text.ur: tvam eva śaktas tāṁ laṅkāṁ sayodhāṁ sahavāhanām

text.ascii: svabAhubalam Azritya vinAzayitum ojasA
text.ur: svabāhubalam āśritya vināśayitum ojasā

text.ascii: na hi te kiM cid aprApyaM mArutAtmaja vidyate
text.ud: न हि ते किंचिदप्राप्यं मारुतात्मज विद्यते
text.ur: na hi te kiṁ cid aprāpyaṁ mārutātmaja vidyate

text.ascii: tava naikasya paryApto rAvaNaH sagaNo yudhi
text.ud: तव नैकस्य पर्याप्तो रावणः सगणो युधि
text.ur: tava naikasya paryāpto rāvaṇaḥ sagaṇo yudhi

text.ascii: evam uktas tu bhImena hanUmAn plavagarSabhaH
text.ur: evam uktas tu bhīmena hanūmān plavagarṣabhaḥ

text.ascii: pratyuvAca tato vAkyaM snigdhagambhIrayA girA
text.ur: pratyuvāca tato vākyaṁ snigdhagambhīrayā girā

text.ascii: evam etan mahAbAho yathA vadasi bhArata
text.ur: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata

text.ascii: bhImasena na paryApto mamAsau rAkSasAdhamaH
text.ur: bhīmasena na paryāpto mamāsau rākṣasādhamaḥ

text.ascii: mayA tu tasmin nihate rAvaNe lokakaNTake
text.ur: mayā tu tasmin nihate rāvaṇe lokakaṇṭake

text.ascii: kIrtir nazyed rAghavasya tata etad upekSitam
text.ur: kīrtir naśyed rāghavasya tata etad upekṣitam

text.ascii: tena vIreNa hatvA tu sagaNaM rAkSasAdhipam
text.ud: तेन वीरेण हत्वा तु सगणं राक्षसाधिपम्
text.ur: tena vīreṇa hatvā tu sagaṇaṁ rākṣasādhipam

text.ascii: AnItA svapuraM sItA loke kIrtiz ca sthApitA
text.ud: आनीता स्वपुरं सीता लोके कीर्तिश्च स्थापिता
text.ur: ānītā svapuraṁ sītā loke kīrtiś ca sthāpitā

text.ascii: tad gaccha vipulaprajJa bhrAtuH priyahite rataH
text.ur: tad gaccha vipulaprajña bhrātuḥ priyahite rataḥ

text.ascii: ariSTaM kSemam adhvAnaM vAyunA parirakSitaH
text.ur: ariṣṭaṁ kṣemam adhvānaṁ vāyunā parirakṣitaḥ

text.ascii: eSa panthAH kuruzreSTha saugandhikavanAya te
text.ur: eṣa panthāḥ kuruśreṣṭha saugandhikavanāya te

text.ascii: drakSyase dhanadodyAnaM rakSitaM yakSarAkSasaiH
text.ur: drakṣyase dhanadodyānaṁ rakṣitaṁ yakṣarākṣasaiḥ

text.ascii: na ca te tarasA kAryaH kusumAvacayaH svayam
text.ud: न च ते तरसा कार्यः कुसुमावचयः स्वयम्
text.ur: na ca te tarasā kāryaḥ kusumāvacayaḥ svayam

text.ascii: daivatAni hi mAnyAni puruSeNa vizeSataH
text.ur: daivatāni hi mānyāni puruṣeṇa viśeṣataḥ

text.ascii: balihomanamaskArair mantraiz ca bharatarSabha
text.ur: balihomanamaskārair mantraiś ca bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: daivatAni prasAdaM hi bhaktyA kurvanti bhArata
text.ud: दैवतानि प्रसादं हि भक्त्या कुर्वन्ति भारत
text.ur: daivatāni prasādaṁ hi bhaktyā kurvanti bhārata

text.ascii: mA tAta sAhasaM kArSIH svadharmam anupAlaya
text.ur: mā tāta sāhasaṁ kārṣīḥ svadharmam anupālaya

text.ascii: svadharmasthaH paraM dharmaM budhyasvAgamayasva ca
text.ur: svadharmasthaḥ paraṁ dharmaṁ budhyasvāgamayasva ca

text.ascii: na hi dharmam avijJAya vRddhAn anupasevya ca
text.ur: na hi dharmam avijñāya vr̥ddhān anupasevya ca

text.ascii: dharmo vai vedituM zakyo bRhaspatisamair api
text.ur: dharmo vai vedituṁ śakyo br̥haspatisamair api

text.ascii: adharmo yatra dharmAkhyo dharmaz cAdharmasaMjJitaH
text.ur: adharmo yatra dharmākhyo dharmaś cādharmasaṁjñitaḥ

text.ascii: vijJAtavyo vibhAgena yatra muhyanty abuddhayaH
text.ur: vijñātavyo vibhāgena yatra muhyanty abuddhayaḥ

text.ascii: AcArasaMbhavo dharmo dharmAd vedAH samutthitAH
text.ur: ācārasaṁbhavo dharmo dharmād vedāḥ samutthitāḥ

text.ascii: vedair yajJAH samutpannA yajJair devAH pratiSThitAH
text.ur: vedair yajñāḥ samutpannā yajñair devāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ

text.ascii: vedAcAravidhAnoktair yajJair dhAryanti devatAH
text.ur: vedācāravidhānoktair yajñair dhāryanti devatāḥ

text.ascii: bRhaspatyuzanoktaiz ca nayair dhAryanti mAnavAH
text.ur: br̥haspatyuśanoktaiś ca nayair dhāryanti mānavāḥ

text.ascii: paNyAkaravaNijyAbhiH kRSyAtho yonipoSaNaiH
text.ur: paṇyākaravaṇijyābhiḥ kr̥ṣyātho yonipoṣaṇaiḥ

text.ascii: vArtayA dhAryate sarvaM dharmair etair dvijAtibhiH
text.ur: vārtayā dhāryate sarvaṁ dharmair etair dvijātibhiḥ

text.ascii: trayI vArtA daNDanItis tisro vidyA vijAnatAm
text.ur: trayī vārtā daṇḍanītis tisro vidyā vijānatām

text.ascii: tAbhiH samyakprayuktAbhir lokayAtrA vidhIyate
text.ur: tābhiḥ samyakprayuktābhir lokayātrā vidhīyate

text.ascii: sA ced dharmakriyA na syAt trayIdharmam Rte bhuvi
text.ur: sā ced dharmakriyā na syāt trayīdharmam r̥te bhuvi

text.ascii: daNDanItim Rte cApi nirmaryAdam idaM bhavet
text.ur: daṇḍanītim r̥te cāpi nirmaryādam idaṁ bhavet

text.ascii: vArtAdharme hy avartantyo vinazyeyur imAH prajAH
text.ur: vārtādharme hy avartantyo vinaśyeyur imāḥ prajāḥ

text.ascii: supravRttais tribhir hy etair dharmaiH sUyanti vai prajAH
text.ur: supravr̥ttais tribhir hy etair dharmaiḥ sūyanti vai prajāḥ

text.ascii: dvijAnAm amRtaM dharmo hy ekaz caivaikavarNikaH
text.ur: dvijānām amr̥taṁ dharmo hy ekaś caivaikavarṇikaḥ

text.ascii: yajJAdhyayanadAnAni trayaH sAdhAraNAH smRtAH
text.ur: yajñādhyayanadānāni trayaḥ sādhāraṇāḥ smr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: yAjanAdhyApane cobhe brAhmaNAnAM pratigrahaH
text.ur: yājanādhyāpane cobhe brāhmaṇānāṁ pratigrahaḥ

text.ascii: pAlanaM kSatriyANAM vai vaizyadharmaz ca poSaNam
text.ur: pālanaṁ kṣatriyāṇāṁ vai vaiśyadharmaś ca poṣaṇam

text.ascii: zuzrUSA tu dvijAtInAM zUdrANAM dharma ucyate
text.ud: शुश्रूषा तु द्विजातीनां शूद्राणां धर्म उच्यते
text.ur: śuśrūṣā tu dvijātīnāṁ śūdrāṇāṁ dharma ucyate

text.ascii: bhaikSahomavratair hInAs tathaiva guruvAsinAm
text.ur: bhaikṣahomavratair hīnās tathaiva guruvāsinām

text.ascii: kSatradharmo 'tra kaunteya tava dharmAbhirakSaNam
text.ur: kṣatradharmo ’tra kaunteya tava dharmābhirakṣaṇam

text.ascii: svadharmaM pratipadyasva vinIto niyatendriyaH
text.ur: svadharmaṁ pratipadyasva vinīto niyatendriyaḥ

text.ascii: vRddhaiH saMmantrya sadbhiz ca buddhimadbhiH zrutAnvitaiH
text.ur: vr̥ddhaiḥ saṁmantrya sadbhiś ca buddhimadbhiḥ śrutānvitaiḥ

text.ascii: susthitaH zAsti daNDena vyasanI paribhUyate
text.ur: susthitaḥ śāsti daṇḍena vyasanī paribhūyate

text.ascii: nigrahAnugrahaiH samyag yadA rAjA pravartate
text.ur: nigrahānugrahaiḥ samyag yadā rājā pravartate

text.ascii: tadA bhavati lokasya maryAdA suvyavasthitA
text.ur: tadā bhavati lokasya maryādā suvyavasthitā

text.ascii: tasmAd deze ca durge ca zatrumitrabaleSu ca
text.ud: तस्माद्देशे च दुर्गे च शत्रुमित्रबलेषु च
text.ur: tasmād deśe ca durge ca śatrumitrabaleṣu ca

text.ascii: nityaM cAreNa boddhavyaM sthAnaM vRddhiH kSayas tathA
text.ud: नित्यं चारेण बोद्धव्यं स्थानं वृद्धिः क्षयस्तथा
text.ur: nityaṁ cāreṇa boddhavyaṁ sthānaṁ vr̥ddhiḥ kṣayas tathā

text.ascii: rAjJAm upAyAz catvAro buddhimantraH parAkramaH
text.ur: rājñām upāyāś catvāro buddhimantraḥ parākramaḥ

text.ascii: nigrahAnugrahau caiva dAkSyaM tatkAryasAdhanam
text.ur: nigrahānugrahau caiva dākṣyaṁ tatkāryasādhanam

text.ascii: sAmnA dAnena bhedena daNDenopekSaNena ca
text.ur: sāmnā dānena bhedena daṇḍenopekṣaṇena ca

text.ascii: sAdhanIyAni kAryANi samAsavyAsayogataH
text.ur: sādhanīyāni kāryāṇi samāsavyāsayogataḥ

text.ascii: mantramUlA nayAH sarve cArAz ca bharatarSabha
text.ur: mantramūlā nayāḥ sarve cārāś ca bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: sumantritair nayaiH siddhis tadvidaiH saha mantrayet
text.ur: sumantritair nayaiḥ siddhis tadvidaiḥ saha mantrayet

text.ascii: striyA mUDhena lubdhena bAlena laghunA tathA
text.ud: स्त्रिया मूढेन लुब्धेन बालेन लघुना तथा
text.ur: striyā mūḍhena lubdhena bālena laghunā tathā

text.ascii: na mantrayeta guhyAni yeSu conmAdalakSaNam
text.ur: na mantrayeta guhyāni yeṣu conmādalakṣaṇam

text.ascii: mantrayet saha vidvadbhiH zaktaiH karmANi kArayet
text.ur: mantrayet saha vidvadbhiḥ śaktaiḥ karmāṇi kārayet

text.ascii: snigdhaiz ca nItivinyAsAn mUrkhAn sarvatra varjayet
text.ur: snigdhaiś ca nītivinyāsān mūrkhān sarvatra varjayet

text.ascii: dhArmikAn dharmakAryeSu arthakAryeSu paNDitAn
text.ur: dhārmikān dharmakāryeṣu arthakāryeṣu paṇḍitān

text.ascii: strISu klIbAn niyuJjIta krUrAn krUreSu karmasu
text.ur: strīṣu klībān niyuñjīta krūrān krūreṣu karmasu

text.ascii: svebhyaz caiva parebhyaz ca kAryAkAryasamudbhavA
text.ur: svebhyaś caiva parebhyaś ca kāryākāryasamudbhavā

text.ascii: buddhiH karmasu vijJeyA ripUNAM ca balAbalam
text.ud: बुद्धिः कर्मसु विज्ञेया रिपूणां च बलाबलम्
text.ur: buddhiḥ karmasu vijñeyā ripūṇāṁ ca balābalam

text.ascii: buddhyA supratipanneSu kuryAt sAdhuparigraham
text.ur: buddhyā supratipanneṣu kuryāt sādhuparigraham

text.ascii: nigrahaM cApy aziSTeSu nirmaryAdeSu kArayet
text.ur: nigrahaṁ cāpy aśiṣṭeṣu nirmaryādeṣu kārayet

text.ascii: nigrahe pragrahe samyag yadA rAjA pravartate
text.ur: nigrahe pragrahe samyag yadā rājā pravartate

text.ascii: tadA bhavati lokasya maryAdA suvyavasthitA
text.ur: tadā bhavati lokasya maryādā suvyavasthitā

text.ascii: eSa te vihitaH pArtha ghoro dharmo duranvayaH
text.ud: एष ते विहितः पार्थ घोरो धर्मो दुरन्वयः
text.ur: eṣa te vihitaḥ pārtha ghoro dharmo duranvayaḥ

text.ascii: taM svadharmavibhAgena vinayastho 'nupAlaya
text.ur: taṁ svadharmavibhāgena vinayastho ’nupālaya

text.ascii: tapodharmadamejyAbhir viprA yAnti yathA divam
text.ur: tapodharmadamejyābhir viprā yānti yathā divam

text.ascii: dAnAtithyakriyAdharmair yAnti vaizyAz ca sadgatim
text.ur: dānātithyakriyādharmair yānti vaiśyāś ca sadgatim

text.ascii: kSatraM yAti tathA svargaM bhuvi nigrahapAlanaiH
text.ud: क्षत्रं याति तथा स्वर्गं भुवि निग्रहपालनैः
text.ur: kṣatraṁ yāti tathā svargaṁ bhuvi nigrahapālanaiḥ

text.ascii: samyak praNIya daNDaM hi kAmadveSavivarjitAH
text.ur: samyak praṇīya daṇḍaṁ hi kāmadveṣavivarjitāḥ

text.ascii: alubdhA vigatakrodhAH satAM yAnti salokatAm
text.ur: alubdhā vigatakrodhāḥ satāṁ yānti salokatām
